results.name: Porch Puppies
results.description: Home-made cheese-stuffed cornbread, battered and fried hush-puppy with a jalepeno kick. Served with our Honey Mustard Dipping Sauce.

results.name: Luziana Gator Zingers
results.description: Tender fried alligator tail marinated in our zinger sauce, tossed in our crispy Cajun breading and deep fried. Served with our own Cajun Slap Sauce.

results.name: Cajun Fried Pickles
results.description: Dill pickle slices tossed in our secret blend and fried to a golden brown. Served with our signature Slap Sauce.

results.name: "Nola" Nachos
results.description: A mound of nachos with our tangy three-cheese queso, bacon, tomatoes, jalepenos, and garnished with sour cream, slap sauce, and scallions.

results.name: Bayou Blue Crab Beignets
results.description: Our signature crab cakes crafted into bite-sized beignets. Served with our Cajun Remoulade.

results.name: Ragin' Cajun Wings
results.description: Eight delicious wings with a Cajun rub straight from the Bayou. Served with celery & Blue Cheese dressing.

results.name: Back Porch Gumbo
results.description: A classic preparation of rich Louisana gumbo with Chicken and Sausage served over rice.

results.name: Crab Bisque
results.description: Fresh Blue Crab in our delectable creamy bisque. Garnished with fresh herbs.

results.name: Famous Back Porch Salad
results.description: Mixed greens, ham, bacon, chopped egg, candied pecans, and our Signature Honey Mustard Hot Bacon Molasses Dressing.

results.name: Caesar
results.description: Crisp Romaine, Parmigiano Reggiano, and house-made garlic herb croutons tossed in our Caesar Dressing.

results.name: French Quarter Market Salad
results.description: A colorful mix of garden greens topped with fresh apples, dried cranberries, blue cheese crumbles, and candied pecans. Tossed in our delicious Raspberry Citrus Vinaigrette.

results.name: Crispy Cajun Slap Salad
results.description: Your choice of fried chicken tenders or shrimp served over garden greens with tomatoes, red onion, cheddar cheese, Monterray Jack, Pepper-Cane bacon, and Croutons. Served with our creamy Cajun Slap Sauce.

results.name: Mushroom & Swiss
results.description: Our perfectly seasoned 1/2 pound Angus burger with sauteed mushrooms, melted swiss, and fried onion tanglers, on a buttery toasted sesame seed bun.

results.name: Black & Blue
results.description: 1/2 pound of Angus beef with melted blue cheese crumbles, black pepper-cane bacon, lettuce, red onion, and pickles on a toasted bun.

results.name: Bayou Burger
results.description: Delicious 1/2 pound of Angus beef with our Pimento Three-Cheese, Fried Green Tomatoes, crisp pepper-cane bacon, lettuce, pickles, and onion on a toasted bun.

results.name: Filet
results.description: 8 oz. center cut filet, served with our signature Marchand de Vin Sauce.

results.name: Back Porch Signature Sirloin
results.description: Aged to perfection, marinated in our house secret recipe, then char-grilled to temperature.

results.name: Back Porch BBQ Ribs
results.description: Cajun spice rubbed full rack, slow roasted for eight hours in our Alto Sham, basted with our own tangy BBQ Sauce, served with fries and Kickin' Cajun Slaw. (Half Rack)

results.name: Mardi Gras
results.description: Grilled marinated chicken breast topped with sauteed mushrooms, black pepper-cane bacon, melted cheddar and swiss, glazed and finished with a creamy Creole Honey Mustard and fresh garden herbs.

results.name: Bourbon St. Chicken
results.description: Delicious marinated chicken breast with our signature candied pecan coating and basket fried to perfection. Finished with a Bourbon Molasses cream sauce over mashed potatoes.

results.name: Stuffed Chicken
results.description: Cast iron seared chicken stuffed with our savory Cajun Cornbread dressing and finished with a rich demi-glaze.

results.name: Fire-Grilled Cedar Plank Salmon
results.description: Fresh Atlantic salmon filet fire roasted to order. Finished with a Citrus Buerre Blac over a bed of rice and garnished with fresh vegetables.

results.name: Back Porch Shrimp & Grits
results.description: Cajun seasoned shrimp, tasso ham, and garden tomatoes sauteed to mouth-watering perfection in our savory New Orleans reduction over delectable creamy grits.

results.name: Blue Lump Crab-Stuffed Catfish
results.description: Farm-raised catfish filled with a delectable blue lump crab stuffing and finished with a tasso cream sauce.

results.name: Lights Out Back Porch Moon Pie Extravaganza
results.description: We start with a traditional Chocolate Moon Pie, sorta boring, but then we melt it just so, add our own thick and creamy Reeses' Peanut Butter topping, spoon caramel sauce everywhere, top it with Vanilla Ice Cream, Thick Chocolate Sauce, Whipped Cream, and Candied Pecans.

results.name: Classic Cobbler Bread Pudding
results.description: Our scrumptious bread pudding, apple cobbler style, spooned with homemade caramel and topped with vanilla ice cream and candied pralines.

results.name: Decadent Chocolate Cherry Cheesecake
results.description: Our classic creamy cheesecake. As magnificent as it sounds.
